title: Mechanics for EngineersDynamics
description: Engineering applications of mechanical systems; kinematics and kinetics of particles and rigid bodies (such as gears, linkages and other mechanisms), free body diagram  drawing and application sin dynamics, D'Alembert's Principle, work, energy impulse, momentum. Introduction to mechanical vibrations.
prerequisite: ENGG 140 and MATH 111 (may be taken concurrently)
